title: Long Term Discount
description: Save with special discounts on rentals over 7 days.

title: Weekend Special
description: Book this weekend and enjoy 15% off on your rental.

title: Early Bird Offer
description: Get 10% off when you book 30 days in advance.

title: Group Booking Discount
description: Enjoy a 25% discount on group bookings of 5 or more.

title: First Time User
description: First-time users get a 30% discount on their first booking.

title: Student Discount
description: Students enjoy 18% off on all rentals with a valid ID.

title: Referral Bonus
description: Refer a friend and get 22% off on your next booking.

title: Loyalty Reward
description: Get 12% off as a reward for your continuous support.

title: Holiday Special
description: Celebrate the season with a 35% discount on holiday rentals.

title: Flash Sale
description: Limited-time flash sale! Enjoy 40% off on selected rentals.
